mapper.select: select /*+INDEX(board board_pk)*/ b.*,m.memname from Board b, member m where b.memnum=m.memnum and b.boardnum > 0 and b.boardtype='c'
mapper.insert: insert into Board(boardNum, memNum, boardTitle, boardContent, boardDate, boardType) values(BOARD_SEQ.nextval, 1, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, 'c')
mapper.select: select * from emotion where boardNum=#{boardNum} and memNum=#{memNum}
mapper.update: update emotion set emoExpress=#{emoExpress} where boardNum=#{boardNum} and memNum=#{memNum}
